    • logPerformanceRecordToFile

      protected void logPerformanceRecordToFile​(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String category, long timeStampNs, long durationNs)
      See https://www.chromium.org/developers/how-tos/trace-event-profiling-tool Open chrome://tracing/ in google chrome and load the generated file
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the record entry
      category - Category of the record entry
      timeStampNs - Timestamp in nanoseconds
      durationNs - Duration in nanoseconds
